title: Specimen
description: David Cortez, a decorated US Marine, is now on the run from his own government after escaping a top-secret CIA lab when an experimental medical procedure turned sour.While lying low in Mexico, an assassin sent from British Intelligence tracks him down. However, Sonny from MI6, a British-Iranian with a cockney accent, offers David a join his team, or be killed.David chooses to work with Sonny, not only because he wants his life back, but because he feels a kinship with the man.Theyâ€™re also both in the unique position of being the only living test subjects with alien DNA in their blood. Could that explain the strong attraction between them?
author: C. Quince
